name: Zombie Apocalypse GPS
description:
Zombie Apocalypse GPS is the best new real time location based game on the App Store.

Enter the world of Zombie Apocalypse GPS.

How Long will you survive? How many humans will you infect?

Zombie Apocalypse GPS transforms your hometown into a doomsday arena before your eyes. Using GPS Location Technology, all players are connected in this colossal game of annihilation. Choose to play as a Zombie or Human.

Humans run for dear life, build your armory, and terminate the zombies. Zombies gather your armies, find and infect humans by getting within a few feet of them, and take over the world.

Download Zombie Apocalypse GPS and enter the peril today.
